item.title: Retail outages drag into second week after Blue Yonder ransomware attack
item.description:
A ransomware attack on supply chain software giant Blue Yonder continues to cause disruption to the company’s customers, almost two weeks after the outage first began. In a brief update to its cybersecurity incident page on Sunday, Arizona-based Blue Yonder said it is making “good progress” in its recovery from the attack, which hit its […]

item.title: European AI infrastructure company Nebius nabs $700M from Nvidia, Accel, others
item.description:
Nebius, the publicly-traded European AI infrastructure company formerly known as Yandex N.V., has raised $700 million in financing to power its U.S. expansion. The financing included “dozens of very well known investors,” Nebius CEO Arkady Volozh (pictured above) told TechCrunch in a press briefing today. While all the names will be revealed when the paperwork […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Browser Company teases Dia, its new AI browser
item.description:
The Browser Company, the company behind Arc Browser for both desktop and mobile, teased its new web browser Monday called Dia — and this time, it focuses on AI tools. In the last few years, the startup launched Arc on Mac and Windows and Arc Search on iOS and Android, but the company is beginning work […]

This is your last chance to pick up the Apple AirPods Pro 2 for under $160
item.description: Apple AirPods Pro 2 headphones are on sale for $154 at the Amazon Cyber Monday sale, get them for 38% off.

item.title: The best Cyber Monday deals in 2024 — new low prices are live
item.description: Best early Cyber Monday are live, and some are selling out fast. We're tracking the best deals on Apple, iRobot, Ninja, Sony, and tons more.

item.title: Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones are at their lowest-ever price for Cyber Monday
item.description: Sony's WH-1000XM5 headphones normally retail for $399.99. As of Dec 2, they're discounted to $298 in Cyber Monday sales.

item.title: Cyber Monday deal: Meta Quest 3 bundle deal for gamers
item.description: Meta Quest 3 128GB is $299 at Amazon for Cyber Monday, now with 'Batman: Arkham Shadow' and 3 months of Meta Quest+.

item.title: The Xbox Series X and College Football 25 bundle is available for under $600 on Walmart
item.description: The Xbox Series X 1TB Console and College Football 25 bundle is $559.99 on Walmart. A great deal for gamers and football fans alike.

item.title: This is your last chance to save big on a 65-inch Samsung The Frame TV for Cyber Monday
item.description: The 65-inch Samsung The Frame TV normally retails for $1,999.99. As of Dec. 2, you can pick it up for just $1,299.99 for Cyber Monday.

item.title: Best Cyber Monday gaming deal: Last chance to save $200 on the ASUS ROG Ally.
item.description: For Cyber Monday, the ASUS ROG Ally 512GB is $499.99 at Best Buy. My Best Buy Plus members get an extra $50 off, making this deal better than Black Friday.

item.title: The Apple MacBook Air has dropped to its lowest-ever price for Cyber Monday. This is your last chance to save $300.
item.description: The best Cyber Monday 2024 deal on the 2022 Apple MacBook Air with M2 chip.

item.title: Special Edition Apple Watch on sale for $219.99
item.description: This Apple Watch Series 8 PRODUCT (RED) Edition is in near-mint condition, but it's still marked down to $219.99 (reg. $429).
